name: Point Of You
description:
Click Here To Download The Game

Based on solving Puzzles and Camera Changing, Point Of You it's a  Puzzle game which involves looking at different angles to solve problems.

Instructions:

Play with WASD.

W - Move Forward.

S - Move Backward.

A - Turn Left.

D - Turn Right.

E - Interact

1 , 2 - Change the perspective

Credits:
